concept.title: Querying Using Spatial Views
concept.shortdesc: Spatial views support a variety of different use cases including multidimensional analysis, geographical data, and a combination of both. When analyzing multidimensional data, spatial views can operate on numeric data and map categories to numbers.

conbody.p: Spatial views support the GeoJSON format and allow bounding-box queries on complex geometries that are represented as points, line-strings, or polygons. Geospatial views also index arrays supporting flat, multidimensional arrays of min-max coordinates, and combination of arrays and GeoJSON objects.

To query with spatial views, you must have one of the following administrator roles:
Full administrator
Cluster administrator
Bucket administrator
View administrator For more information on role-based access, see .
